meaningMnemonic: If you <radical>mix</radical> different types of <radical>power</radical> you'll produce something <kanji>effective</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The most <kanji>effective</kanji> mix of two powers is two <reading>こう</reading>いちs. Take one, mix it with another, and you have something with immeasurable power. You use it to attack that animal-like creature. It's super effective!
